one_reviews_text: About 10 levels in, and I'm loving both the premise and the mechanics of it so far!  Each level adds a new game mechanic and new bits to your store inventory, and it smoothly ramps up in difficulty.   Graphics aren't top of the line, but it's still great fun, and I just used this game in place of a morning workout!

Overall pretty fun. The whole idea and style of the game is really appealing... same concept as those cooking games where you serve customers within a time limit. It gets a little repetative, but I'm not sure how that could be changed. I wish you could pick between a couple different background music. I also think they could have done a better job with the preview video too.
